title: 12/23/20 HOUR 3 - Frank Isola
itunes:title: 12/23/20 HOUR 3 - Frank Isola
description:
Frank Isola joins the show to talk chemistry with the Clippers, the unfair pass Kawhi Leonard got for his subpar Playoff Bubble Performance and Paul George failing up. Having Kevin Durant on the Nets should hopefully be enough to keep things in line and hopefully Kyrie Irving is okay with playing Robin to KD's Batman.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
